title: Change the Store search engine algorithm back, to as it was!
body:
Change the Store search engine algorithm back, to as it was.
To make it possible to actually find an app by its title.

comments.body: I think that the search should allow you to search by title, keyword, author, date, etc. instead of just having a textbox for whatever it does with what you enter. There will always be multiple apps that have the same keywords, so having more specific search options is pretty much a must.

The store search algorithm is broken.  Whichever team or person that designed it, should be fired.  The results returned right now for Best Rated and New and Rising are ridiculous.  Hundreds, if not thousands of apps have been completely removed from being searchable on the Windows Store due to some lame feature of the algorithm.
